EmailTemplate.name: Cross-Agency-Data-Sharing-System-Upgrade-ME.Thankyou
EmailTemplate.subject: Request Met | Cross Agency Data Sharing System Upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cross Agency Data Sharing System Upgrade Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you to Augusta PD who has donated what was needed for the Cross Agency Data Sharing system upgrade. This need has been met and we appreciate the quick response to this request.
